description: Scrolls are single-use items that allow a crawler to cast a spell without spending mana points (mp). Once a scroll is used, it disappears; however, if a crawler uses the same type of scroll more than 200 times, they permanently learn the spell. Mordecai recommends having the party member with the highest intelligence read any scrolls to prolong or increase their effect.
name: Scrolls
rules_text: Single-use items to cast spells without spending mana. Learn spells after 200 uses.
